profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.4 Interactive Forms - 6.4.1 General - NeedAppearances flag
profile.description: The NeedAppearances flag of the interactive form dictionary shall either not be present or shall be false.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium
